message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product for $11,500. I think you'll find this price very competitive given its value.
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  I appreciate you considering my budget.  I'm willing to pay $10,500 for the product.  Let me know what you think.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I'm looking for a price closer to $11,000. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
